Header: President declares open Polonnaruwa rest house for state administration
Content: A rest house constructed for state administration in Polonnaruwa was declared open by President Maithripala Sirisena on Saturday (January 2nd). Located at the Polonnaruwa New Town, the construction was done at a cost of Rs. 75 million; 500 persons can be accommodated by this new rest house. President Maithripala Sirisena presided over a pirith chanting ceremony to invoke blessings for the new year. The ceremony took place at the president’s official residence and saw the participation of 65 members of the Sangha.
